name: Journey to Love and Light: A Global Adventure of Hope and Inspiration
name_original: Journey to Love and Light: A Global Adventure of Hope and Inspiration
description:
In a chance encounter at a park station, the player meets a girl who invites him for a walk and lunch. They enjoy their time together and find each other through common interests. The next day, the player unexpectedly meets the girl again at a café in the city and joins her, excited about their continued connection. The journey has just begun and can be continued in the next version of the game.

Have fun playing the 2D/3D visual novel game. If you feel like it, also visit my social channels, website and YouTube channel for more exciting content and updates. 

The first versions of the game will be completely free. However, the final version might come with a few costs. Alternatively, you can sign up as a supporter in my Patreon and be the first to benefit from new features by getting the new and exclusive game versions directly. Check out the opportunity to be the first to benefit from new features on Patreon.

If you appreciate my work and would like to support me, feel free to support me on Patreon at patreon.com/ProIndieDevArt . 

Any help is appreciated and will help make even more great projects come to life.
